attributes.review: So I needed to open up my view in politics so I decided to see why to vote trump. When I opened it the app CRASHED. ITS A BAD APP, not only that but it didn’t make trump look any better, no trump 2020 sorry 🥰💖
attributes.title: Bug fixing

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to hear from our president Bunker Boy, but was immediately bombarded with the urge to assault minorities. It will take me years of therapy to recover from this incident. Save your time and effort, download Tik Tok instead!
attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️✨Horrible garbage 🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.review: This is the most disgraceful app I’ve seen to this day. It’s founder is promoting injecting bleach into our bodies. Plus it targets all different races and minorities.. especially against the BLM movement... practically promoting violence against its citizens... such an awful app...
attributes.title: Horrific

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our savior the Cheeto man, and I was spammed by emails and viruses! I can’t believe that the most amazing president in the world would support this! I am so disappointed- makes me sad😥😓😰
attributes.title: Just don’t.

attributes.review: I opened this app to see a cheeto and not even the good kind. i am so offended and i will never been downloading this app again. and you shouldn’t either. and that’s on period baby
attributes.title: worst app ever!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.review: This app is horrible. Trump microwaved and ate my hamster!!!!! Then he stole my leg and used it as a golfing stick thing! He used my hamsters head as a golf ball! Then he took me to mars and he said “we r on mars” and he left me there with my phone!😡😩
attributes.title: My dead hamster

attributes.review: when i first saw the app cover i though” couldnt be too bad?” right? NO WRONG. i opened the app to find a small  🍤 ed family sized orange cheeto bag staring me in the eyes. to say the least, me and my 89 month old son are scarred for life. ❤️🍤
attributes.title: yeah❤️ no ❤️

attributes.review: This man is literally the biggest bigot ever! Like what actually goes on in that puny brain of his??? His moral compass is nonexistent and he’s a horrible person. He thought he did something 🥰💕✨but he better not do it again 🧚🏾‍♀️✌🏽🤩
attributes.title: BIGOT

attributes.review: I tried to open it and it immediately kicked me out with a note on the screen calling me a fat pig, I just thought it was alittle rude so I’ll be downloading animal crossing pocket addition instead.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I came here so that I could support Donald but when I opened the app Donald popped out of the screen and stole my child. When I asked for him back he replied “Barron has failed me. This is my son now”
attributes.title: Uncivilized
